label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_003
content:
## 2026-01-05 Daily Operations Summary

### Metrics
- Zone Transfers
  - AXFR Requests: 58
  - AXFR Success Percentage: 96.6
  - IXFR Requests: 244
  - IXFR Success Percentage: 98.0
  - Transfer Average (ms): 705
  - Transfer P95 (ms): 1680
  - TSIG Failures: 3
- TTL Changes
  - Records Changed: 92
  - Zones Touched: 11
  - TTL Minimum (s): 120
  - TTL Maximum (s): 86400
  - TTL Median (s): 900
  - Rollbacks: 2
- Propagation
  - Cloud Edge Sites: 34
  - Propagation Average (s): 102
  - Propagation P95 (s): 260
  - Stale Answer Percentage: 1.1
- DNS Queries
  - QPS Average: 20500
  - QPS Peak: 47000
  - NX Domain Percentage: 2.3
  - SERVFAIL Percentage: 0.12
  - UDP Percentage: 95.8
  - TCP Fallback Percentage: 2.4
- DNSSEC
  - Zones Signed: 52
  - Signing Queue Depth: 5
  - Signature Refreshes: 132
  - DS Mismatch Count: 1
  - Bogus Validation Events: 9
- Health Checks
  - Authoritative Reachability Percentage: 99.95
  - SOA Serial Mismatch Count: 6
  - Lame Delegation Count: 2
- Change Management
  - Change Requests: 7
  - Changes Applied: 5
  - Changes Failed: 2
  - Mean Time to Apply (min): 34
- Cache Behavior
  - Resolver Cache Hit Percentage: 86.2
  - Negative Cache Hit Percentage: 43.5
  - Prefetch Enabled Percentage: 68.0
- Latency
  - Auth Response Average (ms): 21.9
  - Auth Response P95 (ms): 56.7
  - EDNS0 Present Percentage: 71.8
- Errors
  - Format Error Count: 15
  - Refused Count: 44
  - Rate Limited Count: 32
  - Truncation TC Percentage: 1.1
- Capacity
  - Zones Total: 528
  - Records Total: 1890100
  - Dynamic Updates per Hour: 310
- Compliance
  - Zonefile Lint Errors: 11
  - DNSSEC Policy Violations: 2
  - Audit Log Gaps: 0

### Infrastructure
- Bind Master 01
  - CPU Percentage: 46
  - Memory Percentage: 66
  - Disk Used Percentage: 72
  - Net In (Mbps): 110
  - Net Out (Mbps): 145
  - Open Files: 1380
  - NTP Offset (ms): 5
- Bind Slave 02
  - CPU Percentage: 34
  - Memory Percentage: 57
  - Disk Used Percentage: 55
  - Net In (Mbps): 92
  - Net Out (Mbps): 101
  - Open Files: 1205
  - NTP Offset (ms): 6
- Cloud DNS Sync 01
  - CPU Percentage: 71
  - Memory Percentage: 77
  - Disk Used Percentage: 47
  - Net In (Mbps): 140
  - Net Out (Mbps): 170
  - Queue Depth: 12
  - NTP Offset (ms): 3
- Signer 01
  - CPU Percentage: 58
  - Memory Percentage: 81
  - Disk Used Percentage: 59
  - Net In (Mbps): 22
  - Net Out (Mbps): 26
  - HSM Slot Utilization Percentage: 61
  - NTP Offset (ms): 2

### Events
- Imported 16 new zones into cloud-managed DNS; post-import lint found 11 issues (mostly missing trailing dots, SPF TXT quoting).
- TSIG authentication failures started for a subset of transfers after key rotation; corrected key name mismatch on bind-slave-02 and retried AXFR.
- Detected DS mismatch for one zone after registrar update lag; paused DNSSEC publish for that zone and coordinated registrar resync.
- Two TTL change rollbacks executed after stakeholders reported prolonged stale answers at some resolvers; restored TTL from 120 back to 900 for critical A records.

### On Call
- Shift: S. Ahmed
- Pages: 4
- Tickets: 9
- Status: Degraded during import window; stabilized after TSIG fix and DNSSEC hold on one zone.
